WELCOME.TMINE: Task Manager by Inga, Nastassia, Ed
WELCOME.TITLE: Create issues, break them into tasks, track relationships, add custom fields, and have conversations. Visualize large projects as spreadsheets or boards, and automate everything with code.
WELCOME.ABOUT_WORK: About working on the TMINE project:
WELCOME.INGA_TASK2: Repository initialization, Eslint connection, Prettier, Angular Material, ngx-translate
WELCOME.NASTASSIA_TASK2: Writing a service with API requests
WELCOME.NASTASSIA_TASK4: Welcome and Edit Profile User Interface
WELCOME.ED_TASK1: UI of login page, main page and board page
